title: Gear Club Unlimited 2: Porsche Edition (NSW) - Nintendo Switch
features: Drive legendary vehicles through massive detailed environments
In Career Mode, you can save the family racing team from bankruptcy by challenging charismatic drivers of various nationalities
Discover the all-new Porsche Series mode and drive the famous manufacturer's most iconic vehicles
Create and manage your club, and recruit the best players who cross your path; You can take on rival clubs from around the world as you lead your crew to the top of the leaderboard
Manage your garage and make it your space; Customize your vehicles and adjust their behavior on the track
description: With the pedal to the metal, race along more than 1,800 miles of track that await you! On the mountainside, through a nature park, in the middle of the desert or along the coast, defend your position in more than 250 races in championships, exhibition races and Grand Prix. Find all of the Gear.Club Unlimited 2 content and add to your collection all of the currently available DLCs, including 12 additional vehicles, such as the BMW M4 Coup√© Loyal 1, the Ford Mustang Police and the Dodge Challenger Sheriff, as well as many stickers offering more customization possibilities. Take part in the all-new Porsche Series event and unlock legendary cars, such as the 718 Type 982 Cayman GT4 and the famous 911 930 Turbo, which you will be able to drive in all game modes. In your specially equipped garage, you can admire your collection of racing cars acquired along your races. Gear.Club Unlimited 2 offers more than 50 licensed vehicles from some of the world's most prestigious manufacturers.
